Tavatron cringes at the sound of Pyro's voice, each word only adding to the 
immense rage growing within her. The torture chambers! That was the last 
place she had wanted to end up. Unfortunetly there was really nothing she 
could do in her extremely limited position. Where was Dinobot when you 
needed him? Tavatron chuckled mentally at the thought, a small snicker 
escaping her lips. She had actually come to expect Dinobot to save her. 
Whenever she was in trouble he had always been there, but this was 
different. There was no way Dinobot, or any other 'bot other than Tigerhawk 
knew of their predicament. Tavatron and Iron Raptor were as good as dead. 
Then again, Tigerhawk had known, perhaps he had alerted the other maximals 
to their dire situation. Tavatron snarled softly, a low growl forming in her 
throat as she spoke:

"What do you want from us?"
